old_model.result: Attempts to force everyone into same mold, pathologizing natural diversity
examples: Communist collectivization (forcing all into Beta military hierarchy)
Capitalist suburbia (forcing all into Gamma competitive individualism)
Hippie communes (forcing all into Alpha abstract idealism)
Amish uniformity (forcing all into Delta craft tradition)

new_model.assumption: Four natural settlement types, each implementing metapattern differently, each valid for their quadra
new_model.result: People find settlement matching their quadra, thrive in appropriate culture
examples: Delta tribes (craftsmen) â€” focus on quality production, seasonal rhythms, mastery
Gamma tribes (traders) â€” focus on efficiency, strategic optimization, wealth generation

delta_vs_gamma.common_conflict: Gamma merchants trying to extract maximum profit, Delta resisting exploitation
delta_vs_gamma.resolution: Beta arbitrates, enforces fair trade laws, prevents monopoly abuse. ESI types in Gamma self-regulate.
delta_vs_gamma.healthy_tension: Gamma pushes for efficiency, Delta maintains quality. Balance = progress without destruction.

delta_vs_beta.common_conflict: Beta over-taxing or conscripting too many Delta farmers, threatening production base
delta_vs_beta.resolution: Alpha provides constitutional limits on Beta power, reminds of long-term consequences. Delta threatens to rebel.
delta_vs_beta.healthy_tension: Beta needs resources, Delta needs protection. Balance = security without oppression.

gamma_vs_beta.common_conflict: Beta regulating trade too much, Gamma evading taxes, both seeking advantage
gamma_vs_beta.resolution: Negotiation between merchant guilds and state, finding mutually beneficial arrangements
gamma_vs_beta.healthy_tension: Beta wants control, Gamma wants freedom. Balance = order without stifling commerce.

alpha_vs_all.common_conflict: Alpha producing impractical theories, others questioning value, threatening to cut funding
alpha_vs_all.resolution: Alpha demonstrates practical applications of research (innovations Gamma can sell, strategies Beta can use)
alpha_vs_all.healthy_tension: Alpha thinks long-term, others want immediate results. Balance = innovation with accountability.

key_insights.complementary_necessity: No quadra self-sufficient. All four needed for complete civilization. Monoculture = fragility.
